## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### Install & Run (30 seconds)

```bash
# Clone and start
git clone [your-repo-url]
cd Neon-v2.2

# Install pnpm (if not installed)
npm install -g pnpm

# Start the platform
pnpm dev
```

**Platform will be live at: http://localhost:3002**

### Alternative Commands

```bash
# Full monorepo development
pnpm dev:full

# Production build
pnpm build

# Production start
pnpm start
```

## ğŸ”§ Development

### Local Development

```bash
# Start development server
cd v0-integration
pnpm dev

# Access platform
open http://localhost:3002
```

### Build for Production

```bash
# Build optimized version
pnpm build

# Start production server
pnpm start
```

### Code Quality

```bash
# Lint code
pnpm lint

# Type checking
pnpm type-check

# Run tests
pnpm test
```

## ğŸš€ Deployment

### Vercel (Recommended)

```bash
# Deploy to Vercel
vercel --prod

# Custom domain deployment
vercel --prod --domains=your-domain.com
```

### Docker

```bash
# Build Docker image
docker build -t neonhub .

# Run container
docker run -p 3002:3002 neonhub
```
